description: Product Highlights: 5.5-quart capacity, polished stainless steel bowl 500-watt motor Die-cast metal construction 12 speeds for precision mixing Tilt-back head One power outlet for optional attachments Product Features: Handles the Heaviest Mixing Tasks Powerful 500-watt motor Die-cast metal construction 5.5-Quart Stainless Steel Bowl Mixes enough batter for 5 dozen cookies or stirs 6 cups of dry ingredients. Polished stainless steel. Easy-to-grip handle. Dishwasher safe for quick cleanup. Tilt-Back Head Allows easy access to the mixing bowl. Splash Guard with Pour Spout Prevents spattering when mixing and adding ingredients. Chef's Whisk Ideal for whipping eggs, egg whites, or heavy cream. Flat Mixing Paddle Stir, mix, or beat - perfect for cookies and batters. Dough Hook Kneads yeast dough for breads, rolls, and pizza. 12 Speeds for Precision Mixing 12 speeds lets you go from ultra-gentle 'fold' to powerfully fast whip in seconds. Outlet for Compatible Attachments Precision Master Meat Grinder, Spiralizer, Ice Cream Maker, and Pasta Maker attachments turn your stand mixer into the most multi-functional appliance in your kitchen Product Specifications: Product Dimensions (LxWxH): 14.17" x 7.87" x 14.13" Shipping Weight: 17.00lb Shipping Dimensions (LxWxH): 16.50" x 11.20" x 15.90"
